title: The Beginning
narrative:
Read aloud to players:

The neon-lit streets of the lower district stretch before you, rain slicking the cracked pavement. Holographic advertisements flicker overhead, their promises of a better life feeling hollow in this forgotten corner of the city.

A figure in a long coat waits beneath a broken streetlight, their face hidden in shadow.
gmNotes:
The contact is nervous - they've been followed. If players make a Perception check DC 15, they'll notice two figures watching from a nearby alley.

The package contains encrypted data about corporate experiments.

skillChecks.name: Perception
skillChecks.success: You notice two figures lurking in a nearby alley, watching the meeting intently.
skillChecks.fail: The rain and flickering lights make it hard to see anything unusual.

skillChecks.name: Insight
skillChecks.success: The contact is genuinely frightened - this isn't an act. They believe they're in real danger.
skillChecks.fail: You can't get a read on the contact's emotional state.

triggers.label: Reveal Watchers
triggers.text: Two figures step out from the alley, hands reaching into their coats...

triggers.label: Contact Speaks
triggers.text: The contact whispers urgently: 'Take this. Don't let them get it. They'll kill us both if they find out what's on here.'
